Ley y justicia

Existe una sutil pero profunda diferencia 
entre cultivar el respeto por la ley, 
y cultivar el respeto por el bien. 
No hay más que ver a los abogados.

"People´s history of the United States"

Did you know, for example, that in the USA most cases are decided by procedurals (the way some papework was done) rather than for justice per-se ( the right and wrong of those acts)?

6 July 2009 • Send edit request ?
